name: Instagram Hashtag Search
special_instructions: One or more hashtags must be provided, if it is not provided return can_fulfill false and explain accordingly
Results limit is optional, if not provided, the tool will scrape all available posts
The tool will return structured data in JSON format
The tool can't filter by specific users or locations
The tool can't filter by 'likes' or 'comments' count
The tool will return all the fields listed in the 'actor_output_fields' regardless of any privacy or any other limit
